narrative:
This was a focused inspection of the 3.1(c)(3) non-compliant item cited on the inspection reports dated January 15,
2015 and January 28, 2015.  The dirt and grime had been removed from all of the dog doors. 
 
The inspection and the exit briefing were conducted with the licensee.
